import { useContext, React } from 'react' import DataContext from '../Context/Context' export const PersonalInfo = () => { const {name, setName, age, setAge, email, setEmail, discordTag, setDiscordTag, rpExp, ytLink, setYtLink, loadingEffect, isLoading, showCharInfo } = useContext(DataContext) return (

Personal Information

e.preventDefault()}>
Name setName(e.target.value)} />

) }
